words.source: H3190 Hiphil wayyiqtol 3ms 'caused good'; KJV 'Therefore God dealt well', ESV 'So God dealt well', NASB 'So God was good' — all agree on God's favorable action
H430 noun masc pl abs (majestic plural); KJV/ESV/NASB all 'God'
H3205 prep+article + Piel participle fem pl abs; KJV 'with the midwives', ESV 'with the midwives', NASB 'to the midwives' — all agree
H7235 Qal wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'And the people multiplied', ESV 'And the people multiplied', NASB 'And the people multiplied' — all agree
H5971 article + noun masc sg abs; KJV/ESV/NASB all 'the people'
H6105 Qal wayyiqtol 3mp; KJV 'and waxed very mighty', ESV 'and grew very strong', NASB 'and became very mighty' — all agree on increasing strength
H3966 adverb; KJV 'very mighty', ESV 'very strong', NASB 'very mighty' — all agree
